name: KLAUS
description: Klaus is a next-generation memecoin powered by a 3D interactive AI agent on Telegram. Through the Klaus Bridge Bot, users can instantly swap and bridge over 1,200 cryptocurrencies into $KLAUS at ultra-low fees. Klaus blends entertainment, AI innovation, and DeFi utility, delivering a unique experience that goes beyond the typical memecoin. The Klaus development team has gone beyond traditional AI stacks — they downloaded, modified, and optimized the DeepSeek LLM, running it entirely on their own GPUs. This makes Klaus AI not only smarter and faster but also cheaper to operate compared to cloud-based models. And that’s not all: Klaus AI was designed and animated in 3D Unity, offering users a full live-streamed 3D experience directly inside Telegram.
